original_title: Kaye Ballard - The Show Goes On!
overview: This charming documentary showcases the career of musical-comedy sensation Kaye Ballard, whose ability to sing and tell jokes was ubiquitous in the late 20th century. Delightful moments are captured in rare archival footage and interviews with Ann-Margret, Michael Feinstein and Ballard herself.
title: Kaye Ballard - The Show Goes On!
